meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lavish.
meanings.sent1: Her lavishness in decorating the house impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The lavishness of the party decorations was truly stunning.
meanings.sent3: Despite her modest income, her lavishness in gift-giving knew no bounds.
meanings.sent4: The lavishness of nature's colors in the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The lavishness of the king's palace was beyond imagination.

meanings.definition: Excessive or extravagant expenditure or display.
meanings.sent1: The lavishness of his spending habits eventually led to financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: The lavishness of the wedding reception was evident in every detail.
meanings.sent3: The lavishness of the dessert table made everyone's eyes widen in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The lavishness of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The lavishness of her wardrobe was the talk of the town.
